story.title: Our Story
story.content: SalonPro was born out of a frustration with clunky, outdated software. We believe that managing your passion shouldn't feel like a chore. We started in a small garage with a big dream: to simplify the business of beauty.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: Our mission is to empower beauty professionals with technology that is as elegant as the styles they create. Whether you are a solo barber or a luxury spa owner, we build tools that help you thrive.
